thesis.title: Deep Learning Approaches for Source Separation and Transcription of Cretan Dance Tunes
Analysis and Processing of 3D Audio using the Ambisonics technology

projects.name: Deep Learning Approaches for Source Separation and Transcription of Cretan Dance Tunes
projects.summary: Advancing Transcription for non-Western music, specifically Cretan lyra by integrating Source Separation and Transcription systems using state-of-the-art Deep Learning techniques to improve accuracy  and address cultural and technical challenges.

projects.name: Sparse Dictionary Learning - BFGS
projects.summary: Exploration of spectral super-resolution, utilizing sparse-based machine learning and the BFGS optimization algorithm to reconstruct high-resolution multi- and hyperspectral images from limited spectral data with improved efficiency and accuracy.

projects.name: Analysis and Processing of 3D Audio using the Ambisonics technology
projects.summary: The analysis and processing of 3D audio using Ambisonics technology is showcased, with MATLAB tools enabling binaural rendering and evaluations through perceptual angle estimation and acoustic experiments.
